A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: My initial reaction to seeing it was \"what the heck did I just watch?\" I was pretty disappointed. But after thinking about it for a while and realizing that this is a movie FOR KIDS I began to really enjoy the things that happened. It was FUN and hilarious (in a very human way). Try to curb your expectations of what it should be and take it for what it is. It takes star wars to very new and fun places.
